description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan-Style Roasted Cauliflower recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: MoroccanStyle Roasted Cauliflower Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs natural seed mix with pine nuts

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Place cauliflower into a roasting pan. Combine spices in a bowl. Season. Drizzle oil over cauliflower and sprinkle with spices. Pour 1/2 cup water into roasting pan and cover pan with foil. Roast for 25 minutes. Remove foil and roast for 20 minutes. Cool, cover and refrigerate if not using immediately.

Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, tahini, lemon juice, sumac, salt and pepper, to taste, in a bowl. Cover and refrigerate until required. Dry fry seed mix in a frying pan over medium heat for 8 minutes or until golden.
To reheat, preheat oven to 200°C. Return cauliflower to oven for 25 minutes. Thin tahini sauce with a little warm water, if necessary. Serve cauliflower with tahini and sprinkled with seeds.
